pullRequest.title: Introduce label system to histogram
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #5340
As below image shows that there are three groups and each one contains two percentile, 95%, and 99%

In this PR, the bucket unit of the histogram can be set through the metric rule. Since Prometheus official documents confirm the unit of a bucket should be Seconds, but other libraries, for example, open census, can set a different unit.

commit.message:
Add labeled histogram

Signed-off-by: Gao Hongtao <hanahmily@gmail.com>

Support labeled histogram and percentile

Signed-off-by: Gao Hongtao <hanahmily@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: Do you remove this for accepting different labels in 2 instances?
Did you forget to serialize this field?
Could you add comments about how you format this key?
So, according to this, the name:99 is formated from here, right?
